trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods and any overridden versions of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""></xref> in classes that derive from them, when they are drawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> métodos e as versões substituídas <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""> </xref> nas classes que derivem de, quando estes são desenhados numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint` method calls occur when an activity designer, glyph, or connector is redrawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint`chamadas de método ocorrerem quando um designer de atividade, o glifo ou o conector é redesenhado numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs Especifica os gráficos para utilizar para desenhar o objeto e o retângulo de recorte na qual desenhá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics, clipping rectangle, viewport and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o gráficos especificados, o retângulo de recorte, a janela viewport e o tema estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o retângulo em que desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The view port in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: A porta de vista nos quais desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the object to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> associado ao objeto para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> associados a superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe workflow look and feel properties, such as colors, styles and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>é utilizada para descrever as propriedades de aspeto e funcionalidade de fluxo de trabalho, tais como as cores, estilos e dos jogadores.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> que contém informações de tema do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> na qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The area described by the clipping rectangle is the area on the screen that will be redrawn using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A área descrita através do retângulo de recorte é a área no ecrã que redesenhado com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>fornecido pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que descreve a área para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> associados com o designer.

trans-unit.source: If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver um designer um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>associada, o estruturador utilizará as propriedades de aspeto e funcionalidade descritas através do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>ao próprio de pintura.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: Se não <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>está associado com o designer, irá utilizar o estruturador de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>para repaint as respetivas propriedades aspeto e funcionalidade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> que descreve o aspeto e funcionalidade estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o item na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> provides methods for drawing objects on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>Fornece métodos para objetos na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho de desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o item na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.
